0: Everything screams primal in “The Revenant”—the lethal force of a wild animal, the savagery of man against man, the sustaining power of revenge, and the beauty of vast, snowbound lands seemingly untouched since the Creation. Leonardo DiCaprio is Hugh Glass, an explorer and guide who is left for dead by his hunting team after being mauled by a grizzly bear. Tom Hardy is John Fitzgerald, the despicable team member who betrays him. Alejandro G. Iñárritu’s tale of survival, set in the American West in the 1820s, was based in part on the book by Michael Punke; Mark L. Smith wrote
